name: react-native-fingerprint-scanner
description: React Native Fingerprint Scanner for Android and iOS
author: Hieu Van (https://github.com/hieuvp)

scripts.start: ttab -w npm run start:wml && ttab -w npm run start:examples
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node && npm run clean:android && npm run clean:ios
scripts.clean:android: rm -rf android/.gradle android/build examples/android/.gradle examples/android/build examples/android/app/build
scripts.clean:android:gradle: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && cd examples/android && ./gradlew clean
